Message.Title: Premise Tech?

"You are right I am not a jury or an attorney and I do not have all of the facts." Enough said.

"Don't allow these 501(c)4 organizations at all." They are allowed by law, just like the so-called Obama care. Neither is good for us, but they are legal. The IRS had no right to challenge them in spite of being legal. They asked questions that were not relevant to the law; they hassled the applicants and delayed decisions deliberately. And yes, they have lied about what they did and no one knows who approved it, who started it, who allowed it to continue. How is it that our government is full of unknowing people?

Our President said if he had a son he would look like Trevon. A heart felt compassionate statement from a father. There is nothing more to his statement than to see the President is a good and kind man. You here who make up stories about it, not so much.

Well 'sir echo' (and aliases on Maui), we know that won't happen !! Because .. "you" can put as much lip-stick on your pretend friends as you want, but making whoopie with your aliases (in your cabana on Maui) will not produce any off-spring for you .. (you racist idiot)
Yes, that's the image the Kenyan wants you to believe. Nice SPIN tRicky!

"He spoke on it the next morning calling it acts of terror. " After a good night of sleep and telling everyone not to wake him about this incident he spoke the next morning but never refered to the Benghazi a an act of terror look it up.
I am a Christian and so are most belonging to the Tea Party. What are you? let me guess an atheist like most liberal democrats.

Hey Lav, I love Arizona. Unlike California where you have to bribe a Sheriff to get a concealed carry permit anyone can carry here with a clean record.. Most of the cops here support it too. If some punk attacks me or I see an attack in progress they are going to "Make My Day."

J.P. Morgan when asked about the market years ago said; "It will fluctuate." That goes for "T" as well. Some of the movement is rigged by those that make money from those fluctations. Unless you are very sharp you will not beat them. Use a DRIP plan and take advantage of DCA. Use it for at least 5 years. "T" was at $300 in 1929. It hit $70 in 1937. But, it still paid the same $9 dividend. First, I would not have paid $300 for it nor panicked and sold after "Black Friday". Had you hung on and reinvested those dividends you would have been in a great position by the time of WW2.

If conservatives don't like guns, they just don't buy one. If liberals don't like guns, then they think no one should have one. If a conservative is a vegetarian, he or she won't eat meat. If a liberal is a vegetarian, they want to ban all meat products for everyone. If a conservative sees a foreign threat, he or she thinks about how to defeat his enemy. While a liberal sees a foreign threat, they wonder how to surrender gracefully and still look good.

A father compassionate to the parents of a slain child, thinking it could have been his son, is not wanting to show me anything. Obama is a humble and honorable man, unlike the many un-American, anti-President, posters seen here.

Message.Title: My Skittles Run !!
Message.Msg: While visiting my father, I was 'new' to his Gated Community .. I decided to make a Skittles run. On the return trip I notice someone following & watching me. With me being from the 'ghetto' and new to this neighborhood, this caused great concern for my safety. I hurried home and reported this to my father. My father informed me that they had a "neighborhood watch program" there and he would alert them immediately. After reporting this, and brief description of me (his son) .. a 17 y/o black male wearing a 'hoodie' - they said YES, it was 'neighborhood watch" observing me .. because they had never seen me in the neighborhood before !! My dad thanked them, and later that night I actually got to meet some of them .. since I would be living there. ..... AND NO ONE DIED THAT NIGHT ..... (see how simple, non-violent & non-racist that was)

OH NO .. a thumbs down already, and it's only been about an hour (tisk tisk) Mmm, maybe it was from Treyvon himself - still with a chip on his shoulder from 'what could have been' .. (if he weren't such a punk) OR .. maybe he & family are trying a 'civil lawsuit scam" .. who knows (??) ... oh well
LOL, you realize that means 2000000 were also bought!

It's hard to tell what you are trying to say, but joking about a young unarmed man walking home, and being murdered by a bullet to the chest, by a self appointed vigilante who was told not to follow by the police, isn't funny at all. Calling a dead kid a punk is as low as it goes. It's pitiful.
He didn't "follow". He walked back to his car and was assaulted from behind. TWO witnesses told of this to a local radio station. Quiut lying, oops, I forgot liberals ALWAYS lie.

Now 'peekapoo' .. you didn't undersrtand my TOPIC post scenerio ?? Read it again .. then 'slooowly read the last line ... it's just that you guys are .. and have been displaying a little bigotry & such for so long ... and I think this topic post could show what co-operation could bring ... :-b

That's not true obviously, and will come out in the trial. Remember it if you can. You say two phone calls to a radio station prove he didn't follow. Remember that. Let's see if they bring that up as evidence. He totally followed. He was told not to follow. He walked back to his car? From where was he walking back? Church? Lying about this poor kid being murdered by a coward with a gun is sickening. I really wonder what's behind you and your crowd supporting Zimmer. It has nothing to do with right or left either, you're wrong about pretty much everything.

You're wasting your breath. The only thing lewsercorpse remember for more than 15 minutes is that his father may or may not have eaten spaghetti for dinner one night in 1932 or 1933. No short term memory any more whatsoever. It is so much fun so sit back and watch these old fools dissolve. Pity Terrel Eddy's (lewsercorpse) poor son Robert, however, having to give up part of his house to live with this petulant old fool and his decrepit wife. All in beautiful Gilbert Arizona. Is there any part of this scenario that doesn't just stink of success?

Of course, when your son won't let you leave the house, having a "carry permit" is an easy thing to get no matter what state you "live" in, I would imagine. Will you send me Robert's email address? I'd like to talk with him about the inadvisability of allowing you continued access to the computer.
My dog went out and peed on a bush this morning.

The fundamental and most important characteristic of you and the old nasty old TeaBags that post on this board is you are going to be dead very shortly. And the world will move on just fine, in fact better off without you. Put that in your pipe and smoke it (but please don't take too long).
